text: Ezɨ Amnon, Jonadapɨn akam baregha, ghua uan mɨsiamɨn ghugha ifara arei moghɨn amua uan mɨsiam girɨghav iti. Ezɨ Atrivim Devit an arɨmariar akam baregha an ganasa an dɨpenimɨn ghu. Ezɨ Amnon a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ga uaning! Kɨ arɨa nɨn azangsɨsi, nɨ nan buaramizim Tamar amadaghtɨ an aven izɨ, eghtɨ kɨ gantɨ a na bagh kekɨn taba tu. Egh a uabɨ kekɨn kaba inigh na danɨngtɨ kɨ dar amam.”
